question: Mrs Barrett, an English-speaking woman who lives in your town, hasadvertised for someone to help her in her home for a few hours a daynext summer.Write a letter to Mrs Barrett. In your lettersuggest how you could help her in her homesay why you would like to do this workexplain when you will and will not be available
text: I am writing in response to your advertisement in a local newspaper seeking somebody to help you with your household work upcoming summer.

I could do anything from washing dishes to doing and folding laundry. I can even do grocery shopping, in addition to preparing occasional afternoon snacks. I have learnt to do all these chores right at my house as I have to fill in for the duties of my mother, who has to travel for professional reasons.

I have a long holiday next summer and I am planning to take painting classes. It would be a great opportunity for me if I could earn some extra cash to fund the classes while helping you at your home. Moreover, I am an international student and working with you can help me to improve my English speaking skills.
However, I will not be available on weekends as I will be going to attend my classes. Also, I would be taking a lunch break of an hour daily between 1 PM to 2 PM. I hope my timings fit you.
